refnamediv.refpurpose: The Function calculates the Fast Hartley Transform of real input.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: M = fht (D) M = fht (D, N) M = fht (D, N, DIM)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function calculates the Fast Hartley transform of real input D. If D is a matrix, the Hartley transform is calculated along the columns by default.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: fht(1:4) ans = 10 -4 -2 0 This function is being called from Octave.
